title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. This behavior does not align with the expected behavior. The refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working set. Additionally, pressing cancel should revert all changes made to the working sets, including the removal operation.
OB: The package view in the background refilters immediately when removing a working set.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working set. Pressing cancel should revert all changes made to the working sets.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the working set selection dialog.
2. Remove a working set.
3. Observe that the package view in the background refilters instantly, which is unexpected behavior.
4. Additionally, press cancel, and notice that the removal operation is not reverted, which is also unexpected behavior.
